snippet: The new measures are intended to tighten the economic vise on Iran, which has continued to show defiance despite evidence that sanctions are damaging the Iranian economy.
abstract: Obama administration, seeking to plug loopholes in its sanctions against Iran, says that it will impose additional measures against more than a dozen companies and people involved in that country’s nuclear and ballistic missile programs.
lead_paragraph: The new measures are intended to tighten the economic vise on Iran, which has continued to show defiance despite evidence that sanctions are damaging the Iranian economy.

headline.seo: U.S. Imposes Additional Sanctions on Iran
headline.main: U.S. Imposes New Rules to Tighten Vise on Iran
headline.print_headline: U.S. Imposes New Rules To Tighten Vise on Iran
